Articles.Content:
I have a fully upgraded Tracking Stations but no additional Kerban Ground Stations (only one at KSC).

 

My install is as follows:

 

KSP: 1.3 (Win64) - Unity: 5.4.0p4 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

000_AT_Utils - 1.4.4

Do you have ground stations turned on in your game difficulty menu? That's all I can think of.
